ExpSyntax.val: 'BU'&';'&'Admin number'&';'&'Client number'&';'&'Vortex admin number'&';'&'Vortex client number'&';'&'Commercial admin number'
Trim ({0,22})&';'&'Commercial client number'&';'&'Client name'&';'&'Contract status'&';'&'Contract type'&';'&'Recourse'&';'&'System'&';'&'Dunning'&';'&'Factoring volume'
Trim ({0,22})&';'&'Money inflow'&';'&'Average outstandings YTD'&';'&'Average receivables YTD'&';'&'Investments'&';'&'Credit investments'&';'&'Debit investments'
Trim ({0,22})&';'&'Gross receivables'&';'&'Ineligible receivables FIN'&';'&'Ineligible receivables REC'&';'&'Retention account'&';'&'Intermediate accounts'
Trim ({0,22})&';'&'Settlement account'&';'&'Extra fin account'&';'&'Arrangements'&';'&'Stock finance'&';'&'Availability'&';'&'Guarantees intercompany'&';'&'Guarantees external'
Trim ({0,22})&';'&'Letters of credit'&';'&'Documentary collection'&';'&'Other off balances'&';'&'Interest income'&';'&'Factoring commission'&';'&'Other commissions'&';'&'Other income'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (LTIF_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LTIF where LTIF_ADMNO = :2 and LTIF_CLNTNO = :3 and LTIF_DATE = ':4' and LTIF_LTYP_TYPE between :5 and :6 for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC.LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC LGCC, :1/LDGR LDGR where LDGR.LDGR_ADMNO = LGCC.LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and LDGR.LDGR_NO = LGCC.LGCC_LDGR_NO and LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and substr (LGCC.LGCC_DATE, 4) = ':4' and LDGR.LDGR_INCOMETYPE = :5 for fetch only
